name: MYTHIA
description:
'Mythia' is a game for listening to stories. 

Legends and Myths always change from day to day, and the truths get lost in the telling of the story. You are a wanderer, looking for a way to pass some time. Inside, there are people willing to tell you a great tale - or, how they think the story went, at least. 

(Space button to start, and then click through.)
